record.name: Custom Laptop Provisioning
record.description: Provision new laptop hardware. Use this request only if the Standard hardware services offered in the catalog do not meet your needs. Note that custom requests require technical review and additional approvals. In addition, custom requests typically incur a higher cost.
record.detailedDescription: Provision new laptop hardware. Use this request only if the Standard hardware services offered in the catalog do not meet your needs. Note that custom requests require technical review and additional approvals. In addition, custom requests typically incur a higher cost.
